section.p: The Nutrition Section represents diet and nutrition information including special diet requirements and restrictions (e.g., texture modified diet, liquids only, enteral feeding). It also represents the overall nutritional status of the patient and nutrition assessment findings.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-30477, CONF:1098-30478 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.57"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-30318)/@code="61144-2" Diet and nutrition (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-30319, CONF:1098-30320)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-30321, CONF:1098-30322)
Conforms to Nutritional Status Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.124)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-30318)/@code="61144-2" Diet and nutrition (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-30319, CONF:1098-30320)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-30321, CONF:1098-30322)
Conforms to Nutritional Status Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.124)
